TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptManagerProxy extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 当已在父元素中定义 控件时，使嵌套组件（如内容页和用户控件）可以将脚本和服务引用添加到页中。

span.span: Enables nested components such as content pages and user controls to add script and service references to pages when a control is already defined in a parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 网页可以 直接在页面上或在嵌套或父组件中直接包含一个控件。A Web page can contain only one control, either directly on the page or indirectly inside a nested or parent component. 使用 控件，可以将脚本和服务添加到内容页和用户控件（如果母版页或宿主页已包含控件） 。The control lets you add scripts and services to content pages and to user controls if the master page or host page already contains a control. 使用 控件时，可以将添加到由控件定义的脚本和服务集合 。When you use the control, you can add to the script and service collections defined by the control. 如果您不希望在包含特定控件的每一页上都包括特定脚本和服务 ，则可以从控件中将其移除 。If you do not want to include specific scripts and services on every page that includes a particular control, you can remove them from the control. 然后，可以使用控件将其添加到各个页面 。You can then add them to individual pages by using the control instead. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                          ```

span.span: ASP.NET Master Pages Overview

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含控件的页面 还必须包含有效的 控件。A page that contains a control must also contain a valid control. 例如，如果将 控件放置在内容页上，则该页必须引用包含控件的母版页 。For example, if you are putting a control on a content page, the page must reference a master page that contains a control.

span.span: There is no for the current page.
-or-
The current page is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationService As AuthenticationServiceManager

summary.span: 获取与当前 实例关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 当前 实例的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象表示在页中注册的身份验证服务。The object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page. 你可以使用 ASP.NET authentication 服务或使用自定义身份验证服务。You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service. 若要使用自定义服务，可以通过在 `AuthenticationService` 页面上的元素中包含一个元素来注册它 `ScriptManagerProxy` 。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `AuthenticationService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 还可以通过编程方式配置 对象。You can also programmatically configure the object.

public: property System::Web::UI::CompositeScriptReference ^ CompositeScript { System::Web::UI::CompositeScriptReference ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对支持内容页的复合脚本的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the composite script that supports the content page.
A reference to the composite script.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigate As EventHandler(Of HistoryEventArgs)

summary.span: 当用户点击浏览器的“后退”或“前进”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击浏览器的 " **后退** " 按钮时，浏览器将导航到以前查看过的 url，其中可能包括包含历史记录点状态数据的 url。When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data. 如果网页中的客户端代码检测到 URL 包含历史记录状态数据，则会向服务器页发出请求。If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page. 这作为回发事件， 服务器控件引发 `Navigate` 事件。This acts as a postback event, and the server control raises the `Navigate` event. 可以通过使用随事件传递的状态数据来处理此事件，并根据需要在 Web 应用程序中重新创建页面。You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProfileService As ProfileServiceManager
public: property System::Web::UI::ProfileServiceManager ^ ProfileService { System::Web::UI::ProfileServiceManager ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前 实例关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 当前 实例的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象表示已向页面注册的配置文件服务。The object that is returned by this property represents the profile service that is registered with the page. 你可以使用 ASP.NET profile 服务或使用自定义配置文件服务。You can use the ASP.NET profile service or use a custom profile service. 若要使用自定义服务，可以通过在 `ProfileService` 页面上的元素中包含一个元素来注册它 `ScriptManagerProxy` 。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `ProfileService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 还可以通过编程方式配置 对象。You can also programmatically configure the object.

public: property System::Web::UI::RoleServiceManager ^ RoleService { System::Web::UI::RoleServiceManager ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 当前 实例的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象表示向页面注册的角色服务。The object that is returned by this property represents the role service that is registered with the page. 你可以使用 ASP.NET 角色服务或使用自定义角色服务。You can use the ASP.NET role service or use a custom role service. 若要使用自定义服务，可以通过在 `RoleService` 页面上的元素中包含一个元素来注册它 `ScriptManagerProxy` 。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `RoleService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 还可以通过编程方式配置 对象。You can also programmatically configure the object.

related.span: 将角色信息用于 ASP.NET AJAX

span.span: Using Roles Information with ASP.NET AJAX

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scripts As ScriptReferenceCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含显式注册到 控件的每个脚本文件的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a object for each script file that is explicitly registered with the control.

value.span: 一个集合，其中包含 控件发送到浏览器的每个脚本文件的 对象。

span.span: A collection of objects for each script file that the control sends to the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合使你可以将脚本引用添加到已向控件注册的任何脚本 。The collection enables you to add script references to any scripts that are already registered with the control. 您可以 使用元素以声明方式向集合添加脚本引用 `ScriptReference` 。You can add script references to the collection declaratively by using the `ScriptReference` element. 可以通过将对象添加到集合，以编程方式添加脚本引用 。You can add script references programmatically by adding objects to the collection. 如果已向 或控件注册脚本 ，则不会再次注册该脚本。If a script is already registered with the or control, the script is not registered again.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Services As ServiceReferenceCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含显式注册到 控件的每个服务的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a object for each service that is explicitly registered with the control.

value.span: 一个集合，其中包含注册到 控件的每个服务的 对象。

span.span: A collection that contains an object for each service that is registered with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合使你可以将服务添加到已注册到该控件的任何服务 。The collection enables you to add services to any services that are already registered with the control. 你可以 使用元素以声明方式向集合添加服务引用 `ServiceReference` 。You can add service references to the collection declaratively by using the `ServiceReference` element. 可以通过将对象添加到集合，以编程方式添加服务引用 。You can add service references programmatically by adding objects to the collection. 如果已向 或控件注册服务 ，则不会重新注册服务。If a service is already registered with the or control, the service is not registered again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在类中被重写 ，以防止设置此属性。The property is overridden in the class to prevent setting this property. 属性将返回 `true` ，除非它在容器中，如，其 属性设置为 `false` 。The property returns `true` unless it is inside a container, such as a whose property is set to `false`.
